data.actual_result: You do get prompted about the spoopy link the second time you click the masked link
data.expected_result: You should not be prompted about the spoopy link the second time you click the masked link
data.short_description: Can't seem to trust domains for masked links?
data.steps_to_repro: - Create an embed with a masked link - Click on the masked link - Click 'Trust This Domain' - Click on the masked link again
